titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn Hotel Company stock certificate 1987.017
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-09-18 16:25:32 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Brooklyn Hotel Company (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)

did.abstract: A stock certificate issued to Leander J. Powell, dated August 16, 1892, entitling him to 150 shares of stock in the Brooklyn Hotel Company. The Brooklyn Hotel Company was incorporated in October 1891.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Brooklyn Hotel Company was incorporated in October 1891.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Brooklyn Hotel Company Stock Certificate, 1892, 1987.017; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A stock certificate issued to Leander J. Powell, dated August 16, 1892, entitling him to 150 shares of stock in the Brooklyn Hotel Company.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This item is in the public domain.
